title: Staying Grounded in High School
itunes:author: Guest: Ray Vander Laan
itunes:summary:
If your kids have made a profession of faith, it doesn't mean your job is over! John and Danny share practical tips for discipling your children. Featuring Ray Vander Laan. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

DVD & Discussion Guide: TTWMK #16: Cultures in Conflict: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofp-podcast-2020-07-28#refcd=982501

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/staying-grounded-in-high-school/

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
